pros: Brilliant to work for. Great pay and comfortable environment to work in. They manager and senior staff really make you want to work for them and are very appreciative of your work.
cons: Because of the recession and bad economy in Ireland, it can be very frustrating trying to help people when your hands are tied by rules.  It's hard to get funding for certain projects and career opportunities are not great because of it.

pros: Very rewarding job working with and helping older people complete daily tasks
Respite hours given to carers, so block hours available
cons: Not alot of hca's in rural areas so may miss out on hcp calls
